condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017 Leadership, policy, institutional capacity and partnership strengthened to scale up nutrition interventions targeted towards the vulnerable groups (especialy women and chilbren).

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the approval of a National Policy on Food and Nutrition and development of the Health Sector Strategic Plan of Action for nutrition. Despite constraints in nutrition coordination and political commitment, UNICEF advocacy led to the release of USD 3.2 million domestic resources for nutrition between 2016 and 2017. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:13/01/2018

title.narrative: Nutrition Emergency Preparedness and Response Plan developed and operationalized
